tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences ( 
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    preference_1 TEXT, 
    preference_2 TEXT, 
    preference_3 TEXT, 
    behavior_score FLOAT 
)

CREATE TABLE UserActivity(
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  content_id INT,
  ad_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
